summary: Defines a CupertinoDatePicker control for the Flet framework, offering an iOS‑styled date and time picker with configurable mode, initial value, minimum and maximum dates, date order, time format, visual styling, and change event callbacks.
business_intent: Allows developers to integrate a native‑looking iOS date picker into cross‑platform Flet applications, simplifying date and time selection while providing extensive customization options.
